question: 早い
sourceMnemonic: This is a single kanji with an <ja>い</ja> on the end, meaning you know it's probably an adjective. What's the adjective form of <kanji>early</kanji>? It's also <vocabulary>early</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic:
The reading for this word is the kun'yomi reading, which you did not learn when you learned the kanji. You have to remember the <ja>はや</ja> portion to be able to read this word. In order to do that, here's a mnemonic: 

You're <kanji>fast</kanji>! You're <kanji>early</kanji>! Your chop comes down onto your opponent's neck so quickly! As you chop him, you yell "<ja><reading>はや</reading></ja>!"
